More advanced lamp in looks only.

LanguageData.HoloEmitter.label: Holographic Emitter
LanguageData.HoloEmitter.description:
Clutter Mod Decoration:
Holographic projection of a plant.
LanguageData.PlasmaGen.label: Experimental Plasma Generator
LanguageData.PlasmaGen.description:
Clutter Mod Power:
Almost self-sustaining plasma generator. Can sustain up to two light bulbs!
(Requires power between energy discharges)
LanguageData.AutoFireSuppression.label: Sponge Dispenser
LanguageData.AutoFireSuppression.description: Clutter Mod Security: (One time use) Creates cold plasma sponge on any heat source greater than "Aagh my hair is on fire".
LanguageData.ClutterHoloNade.label: Nade Combat Dummy
LanguageData.ClutterHoloNade.description:
Clutter Mod Security:
Combat dummy of mighty warrior Nadezhda. (Distract enemies from shooting at you)
LanguageData.ClutterSilverWall.label: Silver Wall
LanguageData.ClutterSilverWall.description:
Clutter Mod Structure:
It's a wall and it's shiny!
LanguageData.ClutterFence.label: Small Fence
LanguageData.ClutterFence.description:
Clutter Mod Structure:
To stop those pesky creatures eating from your storage.
LanguageData.ClutterConcreteFenceA.label: Concrete Fence
LanguageData.ClutterConcreteFenceA.description:
Clutter Mod Structure:
High fence built mostly from concrete. Good as a cover and transmits power.
LanguageData.ClutterCogCrate.label: Cog Crate
LanguageData.ClutterCogCrate.description:
Clutter Mod Decoration:
Crate with a cog.
LanguageData.ClutterShelfA.label: Used Shelf
LanguageData.ClutterShelfA.description:
Clutter Mod Decoration:
Already used shelf.
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA.label: Locker
LanguageData.ClutterLockerA.description:
Clutter Mod Decoration:
Simple, hopefully still working, locker.
LanguageData.ClutterTrashBin.label: Trash bin (auto)
LanguageData.ClutterTrashBin.description:
Clutter Mod Furniture:
Trash bin stol-- borrowed from an experimental lab of Haplo industries. It comes with a short range cleaning robot.
LanguageData.ClutterCabinetA.label: Cabinet
LanguageData.ClutterCabinetA.description:
Clutter Mod Decoration:
Place where you can seal your socks with 20 digit code.
LanguageData.ClutterDeskA.label: Desk

Come with a plastic plant and full coffee cup!

Advanced looking version of a kitchen mixer. Now with more buttons!
LanguageData.ClutterToilet.label: Throne 4000
LanguageData.ClutterToilet.description:
Clutter Mod Decoration:
Deluxe Edition. Now with auto-flush feature!
LanguageData.ClutterMainframeS.label: Mainframe
LanguageData.ClutterMainframeS.description:
Clutter Mod Decoration:
Small versions of Skynet 9000, now with 2.9% less probability of taking over the world.
LanguageData.FloorAddonA.label: Zone Marker
LanguageData.FloorAddonA.description:
Clutter Mod Misc:
Colonists like the anti-tripping feature in it.

Slab bed Rest effectiveness: 200%
LanguageData.ClutterPodBed.label: PodBed
LanguageData.ClutterPodBed.description:
Clutter Mod Furniture:
A bit odd pod like bed. Rest effectiveness: 200%

LanguageData.ClutterCouchA.description:
Clutter Mod Furniture
It's not making colonists lazy, in theory.

Old fashioned, comfy and fully out of metal.

A round chair.

Standard square table, just a bit tougher.

Medium size table.

Used for storing all kinds of meals. It's made of plastic!.

Now your colonists wont stand in a pile of radioactive uranium, they will have it on their face level! (Store for resources)

LanguageData.ClutterMedicKitTable.description:
Clutter Mod Furniture:
Safe way to store your dru-- medicine. (Store for medikits)

Researchers work here to discover new things.
